meanings.definition: The quality of being unkind or cruel.
meanings.sent1: Her meannesses towards her classmates made them sad.
meanings.sent2: His meannesses were evident in the way he treated his pets.
meanings.sent3: Despite her meannesses, she still had a few loyal friends.
meanings.sent4: The meannesses of the storm left a trail of destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The meannesses of the villain were unmatched in the story.

meanings.definition: Actions or behavior that are selfish or ungenerous.
meanings.sent1: The meannesses of his actions hurt those around him.
meanings.sent2: She regretted her meannesses towards her siblings.
meanings.sent3: His meannesses with sharing his toys caused conflicts.
meanings.sent4: The meannesses of the corporation led to layoffs and unhappiness.
meanings.sent5: The meannesses of the character made the readers dislike him.
